Expected Result: Clicking on the forward arrow, the next image is displayed.

Expected Result: Clicking on the backward arrow, the previous image is displayed.
Actual Result: Clicking on the backward arrow, the previous image is displayed.

Expected Result: Pressing the right arrow key on the keyboard displays the next image.
Actual Result: Pressing the right arrow key on the keyboard displays the next image.

Expected Result: Pressing the left arrow key displays the previous image.
Actual Result: Pressing the left arrow key displays the previous image.
